description.value: Undead harmed by your positive energy might flee, compelled by an innate aversion to the force opposite undeath. When you use a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Heal]{Heal} spell to damage undead, each undead of your level or lower that critically fails its save gains the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fleeing]{Fleeing} condition for 1 round.
